intro: Schmaltzia oaxacana, commonly known as the Oaxaca schmaltzia, is a flowering plant native to Mexico. It belongs to the family Violaceae and is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that typically bloom in shades of purple and white. The plant is often found in rocky or limestone soils in its natural habitat. It has lance-shaped leaves and produces capsule fruits that contain small, dark seeds. Schmaltzia oaxacana is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and limited distribution.
